text: لو ما تاتينا بالملئكة ان كنت من الصدقين

translations.translation: Why do you not bring angels to us if you are telling the truth?'
If you are a man of truth, why can't you bring the angels to us?"
Why do you not bring down angels upon us if you are indeed truthful?"
Why do you not bring down the angels if what you say is true".
“Why do you not bring angels to us, if you are truthful?”
Why do you not bring angels to us if you are of the truthful"
Why do you not bring to us the angels if you are of the truthful ones?
Why dost thou not bring the angels unto us, if thou speakest truly?'
Why bringest thou not angels unto us, if thou art of the truthful?
Why do you not bring down the angels upon us, if you are truthful?"
Why bringest thou not angels unto us if thou art of the truthtellers!
Why do you not bring us the angels should you be truthful?!’
Why bringest thou not angels to us if it be that thou hast the Truth?"
Why do you not bring angels to us if you are of the truthful ones?"
Why do you not bring down the angels, if what you say is true'
Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are truthful?”
Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
[15:7] Why do you not bring us the angels, if you are of the truthful?’, in saying that you are a prophet and that this Qur’ān is from God.
(Why bringest thou not angels unto Us) from heaven so that they bear witness that you are Allah's Messenger, (if thou art of the truthful?) in what you say.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلائِكَةِ } معناه هَلاَّ تَأتِينا بالمَلاَئِكَةِ

translations.translation: {And if you bring not the angels to us} means: Will you not bring the angels to us?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ لَّوْ مَا } أي: هلاَّ { تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلائِكَةِ } المنزلين إليك { إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّادِقِينَ } [الحجر: 7] في دعواك حتى نراهم ونسمع قولهم
 مثل رؤيتك إياهم

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ لَوْ مَا }: هلا { تأتينا بالملائكة } ليصدقوك فيما تدعي
 أو يعضدوك على الدعوى
 أو للعقاب على تكذيبنا { إن كنت من الصادقين } في دعواك
